  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-6400 CPU @ 2.70GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Quad Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 640 / AMD R7 240
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: You can probably run it even on weaker setup.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX6300 / Intel G4450
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1050 / AMD R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Around 250FPS in-game with this setup.
